typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		Column_1 as string,
		Column_2 as string,
		Column_3 as string,
		Column_4 as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false) ~> source1
source1 sink(input(
		DriverID as integer,
		LastName as string,
		FirstName as string,
		OriginCity as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: true,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	dateFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy',
	timestampFormat:'MM/dd/yyyy HH:mm:ss') ~> sink1
